languages.text: "Нет. Атаковать Футфол — вообще занятие не слишком разумное. Тут одновременно швартуется множество кораблей, и даже зарегистрированных на них орудий хватит на приличную военную эскадру. Что уж говорить о той огневой мощи, которую почтенные купцы стыдливо утаили от таможенной службы станции".

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Атаковать Футфол — вообще занятие не слишком разумное. Тут одновременно швартуется множество кораблей, в случае проблем мы просто погрузимся на них и исчезнем, оставив захватчикам голый камень".

languages.text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Атаковать Футфол — вообще занятие не слишком разумное. Тут одновременно швартуется множество кораблей, и даже зарегистрированных на них орудий хватит на приличную военную эскадру. Что уж говорить о той огневой мощи, которую почтенные купцы стыдливо утаили от таможенной службы станции".

traits.locale_text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board them would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."

"No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and should any problems arise, we will simply load ourselves onto them and disappear, leaving the invaders with nothing but barren rock."

"No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."

languages.text: 「いいや、ないな。基本的にフットフォールへの攻撃は、特別合理的とは言えない。ここには常に多くの宇宙船が停泊していて、報告にあがっている搭載兵器だけでも、まともな戦闘力になるだろう。それに、尊重すべき商人達がステーションの税関職員の目を盗んでコソコソ隠している銃器については言わずもがなだ」
languages.original_text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや、ないな。基本的にフットフォールへの攻撃は、特別合理的とは言えない。ここには常に多くの宇宙船が停泊していて、報告にあがっている搭載兵器だけでも、まともな戦闘力になるだろう。それに、尊重すべき商人達がステーションの税関職員の目を盗んでコソコソ隠している銃器については言わずもがなだ」
「いいや、ないな。基本的にフットフォールへの攻撃は、特別合理的とは言えない。ここには常に多くの宇宙船が停泊していて、報告にあがっている搭載兵器だけでも、まともな戦闘力になるだろう。それに、尊重すべき商人達がステーションの税関職員の目を盗んでコソコソ隠している銃器については言わずもがなだ」

languages.text: “不，并没有。通常而言，袭击落脚港恐怕不是什么特别理智的做法。无论什么时候，都有很多舰船停靠在这里，光是船上清单上列出来的那些武器，就足以组成一支相当像样的舰队了。这还没有算上我们那些可敬的商人们无耻地瞒过星站海关，偷偷藏起来的军火呢。”
languages.original_text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."

traits.locale_text: “不，并没有。通常而言，袭击落脚港恐怕不是什么特别理智的做法。无论什么时候，都有很多舰船停靠在这里，光是船上清单上列出来的那些武器，就足以组成一支相当像样的舰队了。这还没有算上我们那些可敬的商人们无耻地瞒过星站海关，偷偷藏起来的军火呢。”
“不，并没有。通常而言，袭击落脚港恐怕不是什么特别理智的做法。无论什么时候，都有很多舰船停靠在这里，光是船上清单上列出来的那些武器，就足以组成一支相当像样的舰队了。这还没有算上我们那些可敬的商人们无耻地瞒过星站海关，偷偷藏起来的军火呢。”

languages.text: «No, no las ha habido. ¿En qué cabeza cabría asediar Paso? Aquí siempre hay infinidad de naves atracadas; las armas de las que se tiene constancia bastarían para combatir una buena oleada. Por no hablar de la cantidad de armamento que nuestros admirables comerciantes ocultan a los funcionarios de aduanas de la estación».
languages.original_text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."

traits.locale_text: «No, no las ha habido. ¿En qué cabeza cabría asediar Paso? Aquí siempre hay infinidad de naves atracadas; las armas de las que se tiene constancia bastarían para combatir una buena oleada. Por no hablar de la cantidad de armamento que nuestros admirables comerciantes ocultan a los funcionarios de aduanas de la estación».

«No, no las ha habido. ¿En qué cabeza cabría asediar Paso? Aquí siempre hay infinidad de naves atracadas; las armas de las que se tiene constancia bastarían para combatir una buena oleada. Por no hablar de la cantidad de armamento que nuestros admirables comerciantes ocultan a los funcionarios de aduanas de la estación».

languages.text: « Non, pas pour l'instant. Il ne serait de toute façon guère raisonnable de chercher à attaquer Castel. Nos quais sont perpétuellement encombrés de vaisseaux, et les armes déclarées à bord suffiraient à équiper une redoutable force de combat. Et je ne vous parle même pas de la puissance de feu dissimulée à la douane de la station par nos honorables marchands. »
languages.original_text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."

traits.locale_text: « Non, pas pour l'instant. Il ne serait de toute façon guère raisonnable de chercher à attaquer Castel. Nos quais sont perpétuellement encombrés de vaisseaux, et les armes déclarées à bord suffiraient à équiper une redoutable force de combat. Et je ne vous parle même pas de la puissance de feu dissimulée à la douane de la station par nos honorables marchands. »

« Non, pas pour l'instant. Il ne serait de toute façon guère raisonnable de chercher à attaquer Castel. Nos quais sont perpétuellement encombrés de vaisseaux, et les armes déclarées à leur bord suffiraient à équiper une redoutable force de combat. Et je ne vous parle même pas de la puissance de feu dissimulée à la douane de la station par nos honorables marchands. »

languages.text: "Nein, bislang nicht. Ein Angriff auf Footfall ist aber an sich kein sonderlich vernünftiges Vorhaben. Hier liegen immer zahlreiche Schiffe im Dock, und schon deren Bordwaffen gäben eine ordentliche Streitmacht ab. Dazu kommt die Feuerkraft, die unsere geschätzten Händler schändlicherweise vor dem Zoll unserer Station versteckt."
languages.original_text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, bislang nicht. Ein Angriff auf Footfall ist aber an sich kein sonderlich vernünftiges Vorhaben. Hier liegen immer zahlreiche Schiffe im Dock, und schon deren Bordwaffen gäben eine ordentliche Streitmacht ab. Dazu kommt die Feuerkraft, die unsere geschätzten Händler schändlicherweise vor dem Zoll unserer Station versteckt."

languages.text: "Hayır, olmadı. Binliman'a saldırmak, genel olarak makul bir düşünce değildir. İstasyonda her an birçok gemi kenetli olur ve bulundurdukları kayıtlı silahları dahi savaşmaya yeter de artar. Üstelik değerli tüccarlarımızın istasyonun gümrük memurlarından utanmaksızın gizledikleri ateş gücünden bahsetmiyorum bile."
languages.original_text: "No, there haven't. Attacking Footfall in general is not a particularly reasonable thing to do. Many ships are docked here at any given time, and even the listed weapons on board would make for a decent fighting force. And that's not even to mention the firepower that our esteemed merchants have shamefully hidden from the station's customs officials."
